attributes.action: ensure that any MP who abuses the expense system in the government is appropriately dealt with via the legal system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's are currently abusing their position by fraudulently claiming excesses in expenses that they are not entitled to.  Should a member of the public in their employed position abuse expenses offered by their employer they would be investigated and charged with fraud. MP's should not be excempt from this happening to them. Ministers seem to think they are beyond the reach of the law.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
